zoomify.gui.title: Zoomify
zoomify.gui.initialZoom.name: Zoom Inicial
zoomify.gui.initialZoom.description: O nível de zoom quando você aperta a tecla primeiro.
zoomify.gui.zoomInTime.name: Tempo para aumentar o Zoom
zoomify.gui.zoomInTime.description: Quantos segundos leva para aumentar o Zoom.
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTime.name: Tempo para diminuir o Zoom
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTime.description: Quantos segundos leva para diminuir o Zoom.
zoomify.gui.zoomInTransition.name: Transição de entrada do zoom
zoomify.gui.zoomInTransition.description: O tipo de transição usado na entrada do zoom.
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTransition.name: Transição de saída do zoom
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTransition.descriptio: O tipo de transição usado na saída do zoom.
zoomify.gui.affectHandFov.name: Afetar o Campo de Visão da Mão
zoomify.gui.affectHandFov.description: Com zoom, mantém o campo de visão da mão normal, enquanto o mundo aumenta.
zoomify.gui.retainZoomSteps.name: Lembrar Etapas de Zoom
zoomify.gui.retainZoomSteps.description: Mantém a quantia de zoom entre entrada e saída de zoom.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoom.name: Habilitar Zoom de Rolagem
zoomify.gui.scrollZoom.description: Permitir você dar zoom com a roda do mouse.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomAmount.name: Quantidade de Zoom de Rolagem
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomAmount.description: O divisor adicional do FOV por etapa de rolagem.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomSmoothness.name: Suavidade do Zoom de Rolagem
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomSmoothness.descrip: Quão suave/quanto tempo leva para usar o Zoom de Rolagem.
zoomify.gui.smoothScrollZoom.name: Transição suave
zoomify.gui.smoothScrollZoom.description: Faz o zoom aumentar e diminuir suavemente.
zoomify.gui.linearLikeSteps.name: Etapas Quase Lineares
zoomify.gui.linearLikeSteps.description: Aplica uma curva aos incrementos para eles parecerem lineares.
zoomify.gui.zoomKeyBehaviour.name: Comportamento da telca de Zoom
zoomify.gui.zoomKeyBehaviour.description: O comportamento da tecla de zoom.
zoomify.gui.keybindScrolling.name: Keybind Scrolling
zoomify.gui.keybindScrolling.description: Use Minecraft keybinds to control scroll zoom instead of the scroll wheel.
zoomify.gui.relativeSensitivity.name: Sensibilidade relativa
zoomify.gui.relativeSensitivity.descript: Controla o gradiente da sensibilidade baseado no nível de zoom.
zoomify.gui.relativeViewBobbing.name: Balançado Relativo da Visão
zoomify.gui.relativeViewBobbing.descript: Faz o balançar da tela menos duro com o Zoom ativo.
zoomify.gui.cinematicCam.name: Câmera cinemática
zoomify.gui.cinematicCam.description: Faz a câmera se mover suavemente no zoom.
zoomify.gui.spyglassBehaviour.name: Zoom Behavior
zoomify.gui.spyglassBehaviour.descriptio: How Zoomify interacts with spyglass zoom.
zoomify.gui.spyglassOverlayVisibility.de: When to show the spyglass overlay.
zoomify.gui.spyglassSoundBehaviour.name: Sound Behavior
zoomify.gui.spyglassSoundBehaviour.descr: When to play the zoom in and out sounds from the spyglass.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoom.label: Completely separate from all other settings of Zoomify. Secondary zoom is toggle-only with a separate keybinding in controls.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomAmount.name: Zoom Amount
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomAmount.descript: How many times to divide the current FOV once transition completes.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomInTime.name: Zoom In Time
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomInTime.descript: How many seconds to complete zooming in.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomOutTime.name: Zoom Out Time
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomOutTime.descrip: How many seconds to complete zooming out.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomHideHUDOnZoom.d: Stops rendering the HUD whilst zooming in, much like pressing F1.
zoomify.gui.unbindConflicting.name: Unbind Conflicting Keybind
zoomify.gui.unbindConflicting.descriptio: Removes the keybind that has the same key as Zoomify zoom key.
zoomify.gui.checkMigrations.name: Check Migrations
zoomify.gui.preset.toast.title: Preset Applied
zoomify.gui.preset.apply.description: Faz o Zoomify se comportar como %s.
zoomify.gui.preset.apply.warning: Pressionar o botão vai aplicar as mudanças instantaneamente!
zoomify.toast.conflictingKeybind.title: Zoomify won't work!
zoomify.toast.conflictingKeybind.descrip: There is a conflicting keybind preventing the usage of the zoom key. You can unbind it in the %s category of Zoomify settings.
zoomify.toast.unbindConflicting.name: Unbound conflicting keybinding
zoomify.toast.unbindConflicting.descript: Zoomify unbound key called '%s' because it was conflicting with the zoom key.
zoomify.migrate.result.title: Migration completed
zoomify.migrate.available.title: Auto migration for %s is available
zoomify.migrate.available.message: Would you like to automatically migrate your %s config to Zoomify?
zoomify.migrate.okz.minZoomDiv: Setting minimum zoom divisor is unsupported.
zoomify.migrate.okz.stepAmt: Setting scroll step amount is unsupported.
zoomify.migrate.okz.linearNotSupported: Linear timings cannot be automatically calculated.
